msg: Made the website design in-line with other Commons projects.

author: mvdb
msg: Applied patch from dan Diephouse (dan at envoisolutions.com
Basically this patch just makes AttributesCompiler extend MatchingTask so it has automatic support for includes and excludes.

msg: regenerated the ant build file so it includes the license & manifest entry in the jar

author: jstrachan
msg: Applied a number of patches from Joe Walnes and the ThoughtWorks guys. This uses a newer QDox release, has a few fixes and also has the start of a <tagFilter> in the Ant task to refine which tags to output
